short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exports WoWHead item data into table for Gear Comparison sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a part of Gear Comparison sheet for WoW Classic. It helps you import item's data from WoWHead Classic into the sheet.

Gear Comparison sheet - tool for WoW Classic that gives an ability to compare items in context of increasing some specific stat.

For example it can be used to choose which resistance gear is better. It calculates how much stats you will lose and how much resistance will get for each item, scores all items and shows you the most effective options.

Note that you need to make your own copy of the sheet to use it (File -> Make a copy). To actually compare item, you need to import them from WoWHead Classic.

Link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ytuZZWVFx5eZ-oY5USheiJDpPYMmSRqxkUwUwLpVfAI/edit?usp=sharing
